mapper.select: select A.*, B.name, B.type, B.size from cart as A inner join menu as B on a.userid=#{param1} and B.code=A.code and A.state=0;
select id, storename, storeimg, addr1, addr2 from store where state = 2 and (storename like concat('%',#{param1},'%') or addr2 like concat('%',#{param1},'%'))
select count(*) from store where storename like concat('%',#{param1},'%') or addr2 like concat('%',#{param1},'%')
mapper.update: update cart set state=9 where id=#{param1}
update cart set unit=unit-1, total_cost=(prod_cost*unit) where id=#{param1}
update cart set unit=unit+1, total_cost=(prod_cost*unit) where id=#{param1}
